justification: Identifies B’s desire for stability but mislabels Trevor Martin as stable and ignores B’s preference for possession WRs and expert rankings. Asking B to give up Tier 2 Michael Foster for Tier 4 Martin conflicts with B’s consensus-driven approach. Only Campbell fits B’s floor need. Trade is also contextually shaky as B already rosters Trevor Martin. Rationale is brief and generic, with an overly optimistic acceptance probability.
